title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS IN THE RESTAURANT IN ROME / DR. MARCO PARET
description:
This woman got hypnotized in a restaurant in Rome, without the use of any words. This video was captured on one of Dr. Paret's resect masterclasses. Non-verbal hypnosis can be done everywhere. It helps us to heal our emotions & traumas, it connects us to our deepest self and brings us a deep positive transformation. Dr. Paret teaches unique techniques that achieve strong and powerful results.  Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
